ERR-001.title: Corrupted Table Data in Research Document
ERR-001.description: Table 11 contains corrupted data '47 A+8 0' in Compliance (%) column
ERR-001.fix_description: Corrected corrupted value to '47.8%' based on pattern analysis

ERR-002.title: Deprecated Pydantic Validator Import
ERR-002.fix_description: Updated import to use 'field_validator' and updated method signatures

ERR-003.title: Numerical Mismatch: Adaptation Time
ERR-003.description: Text claims 15.2±12.3 generations but Table 9 shows 45.2

ERR-004.title: Extraneous Footnote Markers
ERR-004.description: Tables contain footnote markers (1.1, 1.0) without corresponding footnotes

ERR-005.title: Deprecated orm_mode Configuration
ERR-005.description: Using deprecated 'orm_mode = True' instead of 'from_attributes = True'
ERR-005.fix_description: Updated to use 'from_attributes = True' for Pydantic v2 compatibility

ERR-006.title: Undefined Lipschitz Constant Epsilon
ERR-006.description: Theorem 3.1 needs explicit ε definition for mathematical rigor

ERR-007.title: Missing Technical Terms in Dictionary
ERR-007.description: Spell-checker flags legitimate technical terms as unknown words
ERR-007.fix_description: Created comprehensive technical dictionary with ACGS-PGP specific terms
